SELECT AI.AUCTION_ID, AI.AUCTIONEER_ID, AI.ITEM_NAME, AI.ITEM_CONTENT, AI.START_DATE, AI.END_DATE, AI.STATE_CODE, AI.CURRENT_BIDDER_ID, AI.CURRENT_BIDDER, AI.CURRENT_BID_AMOUNT, AI.AUCTION_HIT, AI.CATEGORY_ID, AI.PICTURE_LOCATION FROM AUCTION_BID AB LEFT OUTER JOIN AUCTION_ITEM AI ON AB.AUCTION_ID = AI.AUCTION_ID WHERE AB.BIDDER_ID = #{user_id} AND SYSDATE < AI.END_DATE AND (AB.BID_AMOUNT, AB.AUCTION_ID) IN (SELECT MAX(BID_AMOUNT), AUCTION_ID FROM AUCTION_BID GROUP BY AUCTION_ID )

SELECT AB.BID_ID, AB.AUCTION_ID, AB.BIDDER_ID, AB.BIDDING_DATE, AB.BID_AMOUNT FROM AUCTION_BID AB LEFT OUTER JOIN AUCTION_ITEM AI ON AB.AUCTION_ID = AI.AUCTION_ID WHERE AB.BIDDER_ID = #{bidder_id} AND SYSDATE < AI.END_DATE AND (AB.BID_AMOUNT, AB.AUCTION_ID) IN (SELECT MAX(BID_AMOUNT), AUCTION_ID FROM AUCTION_BID GROUP BY AUCTION_ID )
